entry.overview: Next generation sliders, teasers and product tiles
entry.description:
This release introduces a refactor for slider-based components, like image-teasers and products-carousels, as well as the new structure and architecture for product tile. It gets rid of a Swiper library, replacing JS-based slider with modern CSS solutions and simplyfing product-tile, thanks to CSS Grid possibilities, which gives us more flexibility of styling tile per project, without element's duplication, overwriting or complex layout changes. Note that these changes drop some of the functionalities of slider elements and change strucutures of product tiles and teasers, so they need much attention during the udpate. Chages are spread across many MageSuite modules.
More details can be found in: https://creativestyle.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/CSHOP/pages/2135359509/Next+generation+Teaser+Slider+and+Product+Tile

entry.overview: In-place Video Teasers and Consent Management component
entry.description: Introduces support for new Content Constructor possibilities - placing a Video inside of teaser-based components https://creativestyle.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/MGS/pages/2017525775/2.16.+Video+Teasers

entry.overview: Breakpoint utility refactor and breakpoint change event introduced
entry.description: New "breakpointChange" event on document has been implemented, that can be referenced instead of widndow resize listeners taht affect performance

entry.description: Templates have been aligned with Magento core

entry.overview: Swatches refactor
entry.description: Swatches logic was refactored in order to improve performance and fix issues with displaying price modificators. New changes allow projects to easily apply customizations.

entry.overview: Add optional styles for file-attachments module
Add styles for add-to-homescreen guide and refactor notification-panel styles
entry.description: Styles and icons for new component - a2hs-guide was added. It replaced pwa-notification comppnent. Push-notifications component was renamed into notification-panel. --shipping modifier for notification-panel was replaced with more neutral --slim Styles for a2hs-guide and notifications-panel are commented - they are optional now.

entry.overview: Add additional, universal class for buybox add to wishlist icon
entry.description: In order to make theme compatible with magesuite-wishlist module add a class to wishlist icon to allowa ajax add to wishlist badge animation

entry.overview: Add proper image width for autocomplete image
entry.description: New image optimization functionality by default does not add additional white space in order to fit defiened image size. In order to makeimage optimization faster it is recommended to define real sizes (aspect ratio) for product images.

entry.overview: Add data-product-id to buybox wishlist icon
entry.description: Add data-product-id to buybox wishlist icon in order to add selected class if given product is already added to the wishlist

entry.overview: Fix pwa-a2hs-guide styles
entry.description: Fix for: Buttons are overlapping when I added a static block Fix for: Missing arrow when a static block is added (mobile)

entry.overview: Fix translation and remove leftover custom-modal styles
PDP Gallery: Improved Cumulative Layout Shift
entry.description: Removed styles that affect browser flow in keeping a space for image that is still loading. Cleaned up webp-related code, as not supported anymore.

entry.description: All the overwritten templates have been reviewed and aligned with the newest magento changes. The following templates were removed due to similarity with original/not used anymore: - src/Magento_Theme/templates/opengraph/cms.phtml - src/Magento_Theme/templates/opengraph/category.phtml - src/Magento_Theme/templates/html/defer.phtml - src/Magento_Checkout/templates/cart/item/renderer/actions/move_to_wishlist.phtml - src/Magento_Checkout/web/template/billing-address/details.html (almost the same as original) - src/Magento_Checkout/web/template/shipping-information/address-renderer/default.html (almost the same as original)

Add config in etc/view.xml that allows to show wysiwyg editor for teaser slogan and/or description in CC configurator
entry.description:
Add 'allow_slogan_editor' and 'allow_description_editor' configs in etc/view.xml in MageSuite_ContentConstructor/teaser paths. Editors are disabled by default. When set to true `Hide/show editor` button is displayed under slogan and/or description textarea in the admin panel CC configurator for teaser-based components. If the feature is enabled in a child project change slogan and description wrapper tags to 'div' and style nested elements (headings etc.).
In teaser advanced tab add a switcher to link only CTA button and not the whole slide. If links are placed inside slogan or description only CTA button should be linked.

entry.overview: Hide swatches and rating error message if swatch or rating is selected
Remove "Go to" tablet link for categories that have url disabled
Add top space for Content Constructor on PDP

Add brand area to grid-template-areas of product tile. Align brand to left.
Fix brand position on product tile list view
Show configuration panel for standard bundle products
Add missing breadcrumbs in User Area
Clear global messages before adding product to the cart
entry.description: In case when search result return single product, there is a redirect to product detail page performed on enter key. After that the global message is displayed via messages. If product will be added to the cart this message will be cached and displayed within the offcanvas mini cart along with the next message about product being added to the cart. Similar issue can be observed when product is added to the wishlist and right after that product is added to the cart. This fix clears the global messages right before fetching new messages that are going to be displayed within the offcanvas minicart.

entry.overview: Enable qty increment button when qty is equal to 1
Link with disabled URL will now be a span
Adjust entries order (tabs)
entry.description: Components search-result-switcher and search-result-cms are based on tabs component therefore the order of loading those assets had to be adjusted to avoid style overrides with important.

entry.overview: Add delay for input validation while editing
entry.description: Add editing state for input, which is added when a user is typing. For editing state an error is hidden by CSS. In order to switch off this feature set enableEditingState option to false in a child project by mixin for Magento_Ui/js/form/element/abstract file.

entry.overview: Add visibleSlideIntersection config for teaser pagintion
entry.description: visibleSlideIntersection config is a number which indicates at what percentage of the slides's visibility the pagination observer's callback should be executed and slide should be considered as in viewport. The default value is 0.5

entry.description: Configurable products with DailyDeal active have it's price fixed for all variants (simple products represented by swatches). Therefore clicking on swatch should not trigger price update event nor special-price class toggle, as this should be always on.
